title: Strengthening Customer Service Practical Competencies: Educational Quality Perception and Fulfillment for Enhancing Scientific Field Job Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Customer service competency enhancement program for service/customer-facing role practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can explain core job-related scientific concepts with over 80% accuracy through mobile microlearning modules three times per week over four weeks.
Learners rate their satisfaction with the instructional design at 4 or higher on a 5-point scale upon course completion.
Learners achieve a task completion rate of over 90% through interactions with peers and instructors.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
